programme.title: A Christmas Wish in Hudson
programme.desc: A woman takes a shot at love after seeing a widowed firefighter and chef on a cooking show. With the help of his daughter, the two of them might find love this Christmas.

programme.title: Christmas at the Amish Bakery
programme.desc: After leaving her Amish community in her youth, book editor Sarah finds herself in desperate need of a new cookbook to save her job. She returns to the family farm to reconnect with her roots, and works with an outsider to save her family's bakery.

programme.title: A Sprinkle of Christmas
programme.desc: Libby, a baker, has opened up her business just in time for the Christmas season. She finds herself in a heated online feud with Peter after he gives the bakery a scathing review.

programme.title: Christmas With Felicity
programme.desc: A struggling baker returns to her hometown to try to get Christmas spirit back.

programme.title: My Best Friend's Christmas
programme.desc: When a woman returns home to find her ex in a relationship, she enlists her best friend to act as her fake boyfriend.

programme.title: Being Erica
programme.desc: Dr. Tom grants Erica a do-over day.

programme.title: Being Erica
programme.desc: Erica learns the harm of keeping secrets.

programme.title: Being Erica
programme.desc: Erica begins to realize the only problems she can fix are her own.

programme.title: The Christmas Venue
programme.desc: Losing faith in Christmas after a rough breakup, Cait heads home and meets Drew.

programme.title: Coupled Up for Christmas
programme.desc: Tiffany finally reunites with her longtime crush, Brett, only to find out he has a serious girlfriend. She decides to pair up with a recently heartbroken Peter to win back the affection of their respective soulmates.

programme.title: Holiday for Hire
programme.desc: Katie is excited to finally have a boyfriend to bring home for the holidays. However, when she gets dumped by her boyfriend Dean the day before she is supposed to go, she hires Josh to act as him for Christmas with her family.

programme.title: Love at the Christmas Contest
programme.desc: Angie enters a tree decorating contest to honor the memory of her mother. To Angie's surprise, her high school sweetheart, David, and his daughter, Gabby, have entered the contest as well.

programme.title: A Merry Single Christmas
programme.desc: A woman attempts to rekindle her Christmas spirit, but things get complicated when her ex shows up.

programme.title: Merry Ex-Mas
programme.desc: During a blizzard at Christmastime, a man (Dean Cain) becomes snowbound with his ex-wife (Kristy Swanson), her wealthy suitor (Lochlyn Munro), his former mother-in-law and his daughter.

programme.title: Runaway Christmas Bride
programme.desc: A runaway bride makes herself scarce at a winter resort, where she meets a charming ski patrol rescuer. Just when she begins to believe in love again, her jilted fiance arrives at the resort.

programme.title: Christmas Wedding Runaway
programme.desc: Maggie Mason, a runaway bride, does some soul-searching when she's trapped in a snowed-in cabin with her grandmother and an old flame at Christmas.
